text:
Christopher Jim Birch (August 28, 1950 – August 7, 2019) was an American politician. He was a member of the Alaska Senate for District M in 2019 and the Alaska House of Representatives for the 26th District from 2017 to 2019. Birch was a member of the Republican Party.
Birch died from an aortic dissection on August 7, 2019 in Anchorage, Alaska at the age of 68.
